Feast of the Immortals Gift Exchange [Secret Santa -- PLATINUM]

10
Hips
Saturday, September 23rd, 2017, 2:20:36 PM

HELLO EVERYONE! We are doing a Feast of the Immortals gift exchange (Secret Santa) in Platinum again this year!

The cutoff date to join is going to be OCTOBER 12th, the day BEFORE merchant week at Ebon Gate starts. That way everyone receives their intended recipient and has time to gift shop/design.

Please POST HERE or on the officials, contact me in game, or via DISCORD (@Issalya#5828) if you would like to join. Include your character name and email address. Your play.net email works if you don't want to give me a personal one, just make sure you have it set to forward properly.

LET'S HAVE SOME FUN!

original post located here: http://forums.play.net/forums/GemStone%20Platinum/General%20Discussions/General%20Questions%20&%20Comments/view/3049

Monday, December 4th, 2017, 10:10:23 PM

HELLO LADIES AND GENTLEMEN OF THE PLAT GIFT EXCHANGE. Our exchange date is below and will be calendared shortly. Don't forget!

Title: Feast of the Immortals Celebration (Platinum) Date: 12/13/2017 Time: Around 8:30 PM Eastern Location: Villa Valdarien, Moonglae Var, Ta’Illistim Info: Come and join an early Feast of the Immortals celebration at Villa Valdarien in Ta’Illistim! Those who are participating in the gift exchange can swap their presents. Otherwise we will eat, drink, play darts, socialize, and generally be merry! Fancy dress is optional, but strongly encouraged.
